> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> "After I recover our bad experience in Hydras's blackfortress, I woke up in
> the ark without a beast form... Your other self greeted me and after I
> recovered a little i decided to have my old beast mode once again" said the
> femme"you left the medical chambers and  I started the process; while I was
> inside, you disappeared and reappear as dark Rodimus when I woke up,
> Maximals told me what had happened with you"

<NEW>

DARK RODIMUS turned to NIGTLIGHT his optics seeming to glow again with
their own inner light. "What do you mean my otherself?" He seemed to
be agitated as he listened to NIGHTLIGHT. "I am me, there is no other
me."

Folding his arms over his chest he frowned, "And what do you mean
after I left the medical chamber you changed forms, when was this?" he
shook his head, "The last time I saw you, you were being taken by the
others to be rushed back the Ark for repairs after we had rescued you
from Hydras and I was going to hold of the other Predacons from taking
you."

That light in his optics glowed brightly, "What do you mean?"

(TAG)

Preston
